title: New skins "Unavailable"?
body: So when will they be available exactly?

replies.body:
If you read the [skins section](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-516-notes#patch-upcoming-skins) of the patch notes you'll notice it states:

> The following skins will be released **at various times** during patch 5.16:
